document_source.content: SPR definitions, ArchE blueprint, cognitive architecture

spr_fundamentals.definition: SPRs (Sparse Priming Representations) are concise yet dense with meaning
spr_fundamentals.purpose: Encapsulate essence of complex ideas and distill vast information
spr_fundamentals.accessibility: Immediately accessible to those in the KnO

spr_identification.rule: Never a single letter, must only have first and last letter capitalized
spr_identification.uniqueness: Once defined, cannot be used to represent another concept

spr_expansion.layers: Like Russian dolls - open to reveal another underneath
spr_expansion.components: Systems, components, tasks, functions, actions, users, AI agents
spr_expansion.compression: Metadata compressed back into the object
spr_expansion.efficiency: Space-saving way to get maximum utility

archE_blueprint.purpose: Hypothetical AI system integrating multiple AI models

knowledge_graph.purpose: Comprehensive representation of entities, relationships, concepts

spr_applications.knowledge_distillation: Distill complex information into concise representations
spr_applications.system_labeling: Label particular parts of the system
spr_applications.task_identification: Identify potential tasks, actions, components, functions
spr_applications.cross_domain_sync: Efficient compatibility across industries, domains, disciplines
spr_applications.onion_layer_analysis: Peel back layers like an onion to reveal deeper components

integration_opportunities.spr_enhancement: Enhance current SPR system with Summers eyeS insights
integration_opportunities.archE_blueprint_alignment: Align current ArchE with documented blueprint
integration_opportunities.knowledge_graph: Enhance knowledge graph with comprehensive entity representation
